body.name: ELPHECO Kitchen Compost Bin, 9.5 Litre Hanging Trash Can with Lid, Kitchen Cabinet Door Under Sink Plastic Garbage Can Compost Bin Wall Mounted Slide Open, 2.5 Gallon Under Kitchen Counter Bin, White

features: 【SIMPLE AND STYLISH】 This cabinet-hanging trash bin shows the high standard of ELPHECO products. It’s made of water-resistant material, not only looking great in your kitchen or bathroom but also very durable.

【WIDE APPLICABILITY】 This product has wide applicability to kitchen, bathroom or other applicable space. This unit comes with two different types of supporting parts, both are easy to install. The one with adhesive strip on the back is for customers to place on a flat and clean vertical surface like bathroom wall. The other one can be hung on both sides of any cabinet door that is not thicker than 1 inch.

【SIGNATURE PRODUCT】 Unlike other trash cans on the market, this trash can is made of Polypropylene, which has high strength, good toughness but it’s very light. As one of the signature product, this trash can shows how ELPHECO develops new products that actually improve customers' daily life.

【TRASH BAG FIX RING】 The removable trash bag fixed liner supports trash bags to hold heavier waste. Simply take out the liner and put a trash bag on it so the trash bag will be invisible to you when it’s closed.

【CUSTOM FIT GARBAGE BAGS】 - Our code A trash bags are designed to fit perfectly in this trash can so they don't slip and are completely hidden. The extra thick plastic and double stitched construction prevents tears and breakage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: very practical and the perfect size for 1 person. Easy to clean, easy to change bags. The mechanisms to keep the lid open is just perfect. You can move the bin on the countertop while cutting/cleaning etc. Very practical

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, sturdy, its design and dressy look, functionality (effectiveness)
reviews.reviewText: Rated 5 Star. I've been using a 2.4 gallon cabinet door hanging trash can w/o a LID from Amazon and wanted to replace with a new 2.5 Gallon Cabinet Door Hanging Trash Can with LID for my kitchen. Upon opening the package, I found it "PERFECT" (beautiful design, color, material, etc.) that I wanted to keep it. However, its 2.5 gallon trash can was smaller than my 2.4 gallon (specially its narrower width) cabinet door handing trash can. Therefore, I returned it for a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travel Trailer LOVE
reviews.reviewText: Inside my lower cabinet in our travel Trailer - perfect. Easy to open two ways and a huge jump in ease of use over the last couple I've had - and removed. It is compact and out of the way visually and space wise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little smaller than we expected
reviews.reviewText: In spite of being a bit smaller than we expected we love the sturdiness and the neat clean look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for scooping veggie scraps. Hard to change liner.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect when the kitchen trash can is too far away.My husband hates cooking with the trash can in the middle of the kitchen, or touching it when he has to take it out to scoop vegetable scraps into it. So he has developed a bad habit of piling the scraps on the counter instead of cleaning them right away. I hung this little can on the drawer below the counter where we cut vegetables. He likes it, and the counters aren't a disaster after he cooks anymore.The lid does get very dirty from stuff dropping down from the counter, and has to be cleaned often. I also don't like that we have to use yet another trash liner for this, although they're biodegradable I guess. Lastly, I find it difficult to change the liner, which does encourage us to re-use them until they stink. It's also easy to forget to empty it until the smell announces it's time.It opens and closes easily. I do feel some care is needed to avoid breaking it when changing the liner or cleaning. I don't think this would last in a kitchen with a large family. However, in our 2-person family it should be fine. It was more expensive than I wanted to pay for a trash can, but I reasoned that it was worth it to encourage a perpetually clean kitchen. It's easier to work around another person's bad habits than try to force them to change (and, Hay! He cooks for me. I can't complain.)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Half good - half bad
reviews.reviewText: We really like the size, construction, and material. The unit fits nicely behind the cabinet door, and doesn't take up too much room in the cupboard, but holds a week's worth of compost. We really like the function of the lid, it's a beautiful thing.The bad part is that the hook isn't long enough for the cupboard door to close when you suspend the container from it. It comes with an adhesive mount, which we used, and made it possible to mount the container low enough so the door could close. But... The adhesive failed after just two weeks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: looks better than hanging plastic grocery bag on draw. like how cover opens two ways. door handle makes it hang just right

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: The trash company provided and requires organic waste container wouldn’t fit anywhere except my counter. Ugly!This hangs on a cabinet and opens two ways.
Just the right size, quick and easy mounting, nice looking, sturdy and wwll made, love the 2-way lid, easy to empty and replace bags. Very happy with my purchase.
Me encanto y super practica tiene buen tamaño. la recomiendo.

This is a genius little compost bin that you can mount on the of your lower kitchen cabinets and scrape your cuttings directly into the bin. The slide down lid is perfect! It was missing the bags that were supposed to come with it, but other than that I am very happy with my purchase.
Es muy cómoda y sencilla de colocar, es pequeña y se llena rápido, pero al ser tan fácil cambiar la bolsa no lo veo negativo, también es estética.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. For something so mundane as a waste food bin, this gives me much pleasure. It does the job well, looks great, hangs easily and securely inside my cupboard over the door and the dual opening lid makes tipping food inside so easy. Really easy to clean too and the caddy bags fit neatly inside the bin under the enclosed rim. Please see attached video but excuse the filming as changing the bag is a little tricky with one hand! Two-handed is super simple and efficient.( I also have existing stuck-on hooks underneath the bin that I can’t remove).
